msg: (TOBAGO-291) apt plugin throws an error if java install dir contains spaces

author: nadiramra
msg: With new transport code, which will be released soon, exceptions
were being thrown due to invalid lengths.  The attempts to correct
CRLF anomalies has been improved as long as chunk sizes are ###. So
we need to ensure that lengths are not hard-coded in response files.
